clubs.name: Composting Club
clubs.learn-more: Composting composting we love composting. This org is free to join. We welcome anyone who enjoys gardening, decomposers, or saving the earth. We have bi-weekly meetings where we discuss composting like what are the best materials to compost, how to customize your compost for each plant, and many other topics.

events.title: Composting Panel
events.description: Learn from the experts of composting! Free kale salads!

events.title: Week 8 GBM
events.description: Bi-Weekly GBM

events.title: Garden Party
events.description: Plant some flowers and socialize with others. Free food!

clubs.name: Cycling Club
clubs.description: We like bicycling, bicycling is our passion
clubs.learn-more: Want a fun way to stay fit? Join the Cycling Club! We have monthly bicycling trips where we all bike together to a fun new destination. We welcome cyclers of all levels, so don't be intimidated!

events.title: Bicycler Mixer
events.description: Meet others who have the same passion for bicycling!

events.title: Bike for Humanity
events.description: Get a workout while also supporting a great cause!

events.title: Bake Sale
events.description: Help us raise money toward our cross-country biking trip!

events.title: San Diego Bicycling Tour
events.description: See the landmarks of San Diego on this biking tour, anyone is free to join!

clubs.name: Reusable Tote Bag Crusaders
clubs.learn-more: Plastic bags are such a waste, and bad for the environment! Get on the tote life! We sell tote bags for cheap, and occasionally give them out for free.

events.title: Create your own tote bags
events.description: We will have screen printing stations so everyone can have their own personalized tote bag

events.title: Free tote bags!
events.description: We'll be handing out free tote bags on library walk

clubs.name: Save the Bees
clubs.description: We love bees more than people
clubs.learn-more: Bees are dying and we need to help! We are a volunteering club that aims to raise awareness on this issue, and help protect bees. You'll also learn cool info about bees and beekeeping!

events.title: Beekeeping Workshop
events.description: Local beekeepers will show you how to have a hive of your own

clubs.name: Extreme Knitting Club
clubs.learn-more: We're a knitting club that meets every week. A fee is required for membership, but we provide access to lots of patterns, and free food. Kit with friends while munching on cheese and crackers!

events.title: Knit-a-thon
events.description: 24-hours of nonstop knitting! See who can last the longest! Free food will be provided.

events.title: Week 8 GBM
events.description: Weekly GBM, get together with fellow knitters!

events.title: Knitting Circle
events.description: Share your latest projects, learn new techniques from other knitters

clubs.name: Music Club
clubs.description: We're the real life version of High School Musical!
clubs.learn-more: We're a club that really appreciates music. Join us for our events such as singing with Scott Klemmer and Barney the Dinosaur.

events.title: Music at ChuckECheese
events.description: Join us in enjoying music at ChuckECheese! Rides at Peterson Loop.

events.title: Charlie Brown Music Lesson
events.description: Learn music from the Charlie Brown! Light refreshments provided.

clubs.name: Tennis Club
clubs.learn-more: We're a club that supports all forms of tennis, whether competitive or social, we have it all here!

events.title: Tennis with SDSU
events.description: Join us and SDSU for a day of fun and tennis.

events.title: Stringing Workshop
events.description: We will be learning how to restring our raquets together.

clubs.name: Cooking Club
clubs.description: Learn some new recipies to spice up your table!
clubs.learn-more: Ever want to make the pie of your dreams? What about mouth watering chicken? Learn how to make those dishes and more here.

events.title: Turkey with Reno Jackson
events.description: Learn how to create a wonderful Turkey Dish with Reno Jackson to impress your friends and family!.

clubs.name: Agriculture Club
clubs.description: Become one with agriculture to help the world go round!
clubs.learn-more: Want to help and learn about the farming process and animals that make our lives possible? Join today!

events.title: Trip to San Diego's Honey Farms
events.location: Meet up at Price Center Loop
events.description: Come to San Diego's Honey Farm where we will learn how bees and honey keep the world healthy and sustainable.

clubs.name: Bike Club
clubs.description: Find your perfect bike today! Learn how to build, repair, and find the best bike for your rides.
clubs.learn-more: Learn what makes a bike, a bike! We dive into the intricies of the best thing since sliced bread, the wheeled contraption known as the bike.

events.title: Bike Design Time
events.location: Warren College Room in Price Center
events.description: Find out what makes a bike look SPICY, we'll visit current and previous trends to figure out what makes your ride slick.

clubs.name: Crochet Club
clubs.description: Remember your favorite sweater made by your grandma?
clubs.learn-more: We remember, and we want to help you make beautiful items through crochet so that you will make someone else very happy.

events.title: Crochet Competition
events.description: Come join us in our annual Crochet Competition, where we will crochet our best creation to date. Prizes will be awarded!

clubs.name: Animal Appreciation Club
clubs.learn-more: Here at Animal Appreciation Club we like to take a look at how great animals have made our lives and appreciate them.

events.title: Dog Park Quarterlies
events.description: Each quarter, Animal Appreciation Club will meet up at Warren Field to play with therapy puppies! No cats allowed

clubs.name: Ping Pong Club
clubs.description: Ping pong, table tennis, GAME ON!
clubs.learn-more: Serve, smash, Win! Here at UCSD Ping Pong Club, we are dedicated to using every muscle in our body to WIN at table tennis.

events.title: Gains for Days
events.description: Join the Ping Pong club at getting yolked up. We'll teach you our gym menus so you can be bulked up to SMASH DOWN.

clubs.name: Taste of Heaven
clubs.description: Cupcakes, macarons, and pies that taste like bliss.
clubs.learn-more: Want to make your mouth feel like heaven? Join our club today and enjoy some of the best baked goods you'll ever have.

events.title: Tea Time with ToH
events.description: Join Taste of Heaven for our Finals Week Tea Time! Enjoy fresh baked goods with some rich brewed coffee and meet some angels today.

clubs.name: Theatre Club
clubs.description: Singing, Dancing, Acting, all in one place. ACTION!
clubs.learn-more: Ever want to be part of your favorite play? Join the theatre club where we will show off our theatrical talents to the world!

events.title: Shrek Auditions
events.description: Audition for hottest new theatrical stunner: Shrek. We will have auditions to find our perfect green ogre and donkey.

events.title: Fight Me
events.description: We're gonna fight people
